they spin and generate electricity

will the the buoys be lit there just a

fishermen have also expressed concerns
about verdun power in the East River and
like fen Avera Verdun has also faced

again in 2007 the company installed
earlier versions of their turbines both

destroyed the blades and rotors forcing

they're just too weak for this water

supposed to break and they still didn't

they will be able to generate power for
